newsitem.title: USA: Seibels Bruce Group common stock offering.
newsitem.headline: Seibels Bruce Group common stock offering.

text.p: The Seibels Bruce Group Inc announced the sale of 2,853,089 shares of common stock at a public offering price of $7.00 per share on Wednesday.
Of the total shares being sold in the offering, 1,000,000 shares are being sold by the company and 1,853,089 shares are being sold by a selling stockholder.

The company has granted the underwriters an overallotment option to acquire an additional 427,963 shares of common stock in connection with the offering. Managing underwriters of the offering are Advest Inc and Scott & Stringfellow Inc.
Seibels Bruce provides automobile, flood and other property and casualty insurance services and products through independent agents primarily in the Southeastern United States.
